column1: * 1980 - The animated film The Return of the King (1980 film) is first aired in the US.
* 1997 - Final day of Bree Moot 3 in wikipedia:Minneapolis.
* 2001 - Kinder Surprise begins its Lord of the Rings promotion in Germany.
